about_the_game:
ARE YOU THE ONE?



Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of 'One: Secret Empire,' where you take on the role of Kain, a survivor of Omega-7 squad, as you explore the enigmatic mining asteroid of the SCP. Work alongside the fearless hacker and pilot Karen, and her peculiar robot companion D-12, as you navigate through a dark narrative filled with mystery, horror, and unexpected twists. Confront killer robots, biological experiments, uncover the dark secrets of the federation, and learn the truth behind the ominous activities in the futuristic mining complex. Get ready to explore a world of danger, survival, and intrigue, where every decision could mean the difference between life and death. And remember, that the truth can be more dangerous than fiction itself.

  • Inmersive Single player campaign

    Embark on a unique gaming experience with a single-player campaign. Confront horrors and unravel mysteries on the SCP Federation's mining asteroid. Every discovery is a challenge, every shadow a truth to be revealed on this science fiction journey.

  • Intense Combat and Survival Strategy

    Face relentless challenges with a combat system that combines the intensity of survival horror with the thrill of dealing with killer machines and biological experiments. Find powerful weapons, make diagonal moves, and use upgrades to enhance your arsenal. Break conventional rules with an advanced melee system.

  • Detailed Exploration of the Asteroid

    Discover hidden secrets by exploring the environments of the mining asteroid. The story unfolds as you delve into dark corners and unravel mysteries related to the SCP Federation. Find character upgrades, such as the Dash, allowing for more dynamic exploration, and uncover unique documents.

  • Moral Dilemmas

    Kain, the last defender of Omega-7's elite, is immersed in complex moral dilemmas. The decisions made by Kain have the power to alter the course of the system's history.

  • Break The Rules

    Every action, from reloading to checking your inventory, gives killer machines and biological experiments the perfect opportunity to attack. This game is unforgiving and demands constant vigilance. The enigma has begun, and it's up to you to discover the truth behind what happened on this mining asteroid. Do you have what it takes to stay alert and survive this intense experience? Break the rules and challenge the relentless flow of time.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains graphic representations of violence, including situations where people die in graphic scenarios. Additionally, it features violent action, mild nudity, and vulgar language.

name: One: Secret Empire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: intel core i5 9gen / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel core i5 12gen / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 8 GB / AMD Radeon RX 6600 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: Join Kain, Omega-7’s last survivor, uncovering secrets on an SCP Federation asteroid. Unravel the truth, endure chaos, and delve into a conspiracy that could reshape SCP history in this sci-fi thriller.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
